tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_retention_rates (
    employee_id INT,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(100),
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    hired_date DATE,
    retention_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE retention_rates (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50),
  hire_date DATE,
  termination_date DATE,
  retention_rate DECIMAL(5,2)
);
CREATE TABLE retention_rates ( employee_id INT, starting_date DATE, ending_date DATE, underrepresented_group BOOLEAN, retention_rate FLOAT );
CREATE TABLE employee_details ( employee_id INT, name VARCHAR(50), gender VARCHAR(10), race VARCHAR(50), hire_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE underrepresented_groups ( group_id INT, group_name VARCHAR(50), group_description TEXT );

CREATE TABLE employee_demographics (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gender VARCHAR,
    ethnicity VARCHAR,
    hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE retention_rates (
    retention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT REFERENCES employee_demographics(employee_id),
    retention_rate DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE underrepresented_groups (
    group_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    group_name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE employee_groups (
    group_id INT PRIMARY KEY REFERENCES underrepresented_groups(group_id),
    employee_id INT REFERENCES employee_demographics(employee_id)
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeRetention (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    hire_date DATE,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    retention_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeDemographics (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    education VARCHAR(50),
    years_of_experience INT
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeePerformance (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    performance_score FLOAT,
    promotion_status BOOLEAN,
    feedback TEXT,
    manager_id INT,
    department VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeeFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    reviewer_id INT,
    review_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeePromotion (
    promotion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    promotion_date DATE,
    promotion_type VARCHAR(50),
    previous_position VARCHAR(50),
    new_position VARCHAR(50)
)
